014package org.microbean.bean;
015
016import java.lang.constant.ClassDesc;
017import java.lang.constant.DynamicConstantDesc;
018import java.lang.constant.MethodHandleDesc;
019
020import java.util.Objects;
021import java.util.Optional;
022import java.util.Set;
023
024import org.microbean.constant.Constables;
025
026import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.BSM_INVOKE;
027import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_Object;
028import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.CD_boolean;
029import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.FALSE;
030import static java.lang.constant.ConstantDescs.TRUE;
031
032public final class Singleton<I> implements Factory<I> {
033
034  private static final ClassDesc CD_Singleton = ClassDesc.of(Singleton.class.getName());
035
036  private volatile I singleton;
037
038  private final I product;
039
040  public Singleton(final I product) {
041    this(product, false);
042  }
043
044  public Singleton(final I product, final boolean preCreate) {
045    super();
046    this.product = Objects.requireNonNull(product, "product");
047    this.singleton = preCreate ? product : null;
048  }
049
050  @Override // Factory<I> (Aggregate)
051  public final Set<Dependency> dependencies() {
052    return Set.of();
053  }
054
055  @Override // Factory<I>
056  public final boolean destroys() {
057    return false;
058  }
059
060  @Override // Factory<I>
061  public final I singleton() {
062    return this.singleton;
063  }
064
065  @Override // Factory<I>
066  public final I create(final Creation<I> c, final ReferenceSelector rs) {
067    if (this.singleton == null) {
068      this.singleton = this.product;
069    }
070    return this.product;
071  }
072
073  @Override // Factory<I> (Constable)
074  public final Optional<DynamicConstantDesc<Singleton<I>>> describeConstable() {
075    return Constables.describeConstable(this.product)
076      .map(productDesc -> DynamicConstantDesc.of(BSM_INVOKE,
077                                                 MethodHandleDesc.ofConstructor(CD_Singleton,
078                                                                                CD_Object,
079                                                                                CD_boolean),
080                                                 productDesc,
081                                                 this.singleton == null ? FALSE : TRUE));
082  }
083
084}
